description: This file defines a single exported async function `linkCloudAccount` that interacts with a backend Edge Function named 'link-account' to link cloud provider accounts (AWS, Azure, GCP). It constructs a payload based on input parameters and invokes the function via Supabase client, handling errors gracefully.

methods.name: linkCloudAccount({ provider, name, credentials })
methods.description: Asynchronous function to call the 'link-account' Edge Function with provider-specific credentials and metadata, returning the response data or error information.

ctags.name: linkCloudAccount
ctags.pattern: /^export async function linkCloudAccount({ provider, name, credentials }) {$/
